website_summaries.verdict: Between the impressive 12-hour lifespan of each votive candle, and how easy it is to decorate for an event at a fairly low price, this is a great deal.
pros: 12 hours of burn time per candle

customer_reviews.title: Votive jars explode. Faulty candles!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these candles and had them lit on a desk for a few hours. After a while, I heard a "ping" and saw that the glass had shattered because the wick of the candle was placed too close to the glass and it overheated and burst! Luckily, I was paying attention and could blow out the candle quickly. Don't buy these candles! They are a huge fire hazard if I had not been paying very close attention to it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely usable.
customer_reviews.text: These appeared to be what I wanted and needed. However having just reached the end of the first candle I unboxed I found a fatal flaw. My entire package of candles was not only packaged badly with little to no way to keep them from bumping about in their box, they were packaged serially upside down. Because of this all the wicks separated from their base attachment in the bottom of the glasses. Which means the wick burns away in the liquid wax and leaves about 1/3 of an unburnt candle when it’s all said and done.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: The candles are nice enough and certainly a deal for the price. They give off a nice light and the glass containers themselves are nice. However, I wouldn't say the burn time was 12 hours as advertised — maybe more somewhere around 9 or 10. Also the candles leave a waxy residue when they are burnt and the wax liquifys very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Also can see where the original was stuck in the bottom of the glass and the candles now come out easily. I have purchased these before from a different ...
customer_reviews.text: These candles aren't the original candles. Someone put replacement candles in the glasses. There's wax all over the glasses. Definitely have been used. Also can see where the original was stuck in the bottom of the glass and the candles now come out easily. I have purchased these before and they were completely different and new. Edited- I ordered another set and now they’re perfect. Nothing like the previous set was!
customer_reviews.author: sharon e.

customer_reviews.title: like described. They come in glass holders
customer_reviews.text: These candles have no sent, like described. They come in glass holders, similar to shot glasses... which is what i plan to make out of them when the candles are done haha. Worth the purchase! They go well with other colored candles, and they last a while!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer1003

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Do not buy these votive candles.
customer_reviews.text: This box came unprotected with packing so some were broken. The inter box with the votive candles looked like someone threw up on it and then wrapped the box in plastic... disgusting! The candles have a vanilla smell which were supposed to have been unscented. When burning them they burned down 1/4 of the way and went out. Terrible! Do not buy these votive candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color of these candles
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color of these candles! They are a nice off~white. I did have 1 broken one when they arrived. I ordered 2 boxes for my daughters wedding and open both. Glad I did because the glass I one box was very smudgy with candle wax so I wiped them before the big day.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Down in Flames
customer_reviews.text: These candles are useless. The wax swallows the flame constantly and they don’t stay lit.
customer_reviews.author: T. gates

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. They are unscented but that isn’t a big deal. They are going in my wedding centerpieces. I would order again if I needed some
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Singley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a great packaging, if your looking for small unscented candles look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great candles for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. My girlfriend loved them. She loves taking long baths with these candles lite all around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: They arrived slightly melted from the summer heat (it is June!) but once I wiped off the extra wax they look great! I glued black around the edges and am using them as part of the centerpieces for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: No cons - good candles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two boxes of these because I just burn through them so quickly. I love putting these all over the place for the ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Manriquez

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Candles burn relatively evenly and last a decent amount of time. They are unscented, which make them great to mix and match with a scented candle to light up a room. Good price and the fact that they are in glass is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtus

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these votives several times but this last batch of 2 dozen was awful. Wax all over the outside and insides of the glass, and the candles themselves had nick marks. A couple of the glass votives were not even round! Would NOT buy again. Embarrassing as these were to be gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works for power outages
customer_reviews.text: I buy these unscented candles for if I ever lose power. I love them they burn for around 12 hrs. When I lose power, I dont want to light scented candles its overwhelming. These work perfectly and I can place them in several rooms without alot of worry bc they come in glass holders.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these last minute before our wedding and they arrived on time. Worked great as decor for our wedding reception and looked beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Great romantic candles
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to make anything romantic while also lasting a long time! Really glad I bought these
customer_reviews.author: Briana Soto

customer_reviews.title: There's one candle that's pink-ish in color; all the ...
customer_reviews.text: There's one candle that's pink-ish in color; all the others white. It doesn't have a sent to it; I assume it's just a fluke thing.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkles

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. Presentation not so much
customer_reviews.text: The candles came with a bunch of dried wax flakes on the outside of the glass of each candle. It was hard to get off. But for the purpose I was using them for, it was fine. Just made the glass holders not look very new/clean/sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the Money glass votives very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glass votive candles. I think the burn time is a good bit shorter than stated, but for the price these are great and will last for an evening or two.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Presswood

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well in Halloween Pumpkins
customer_reviews.text: Burned nice and bright right down to the bottom inside of my Halloween pumpkins outside on a chilly and windy night. No problems with off-center wicks or glass shattering as some reviews describe.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wedding!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and they looked great! Burn time was well over 5 hours and they were only half gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great votive candles
customer_reviews.text: They burn clean and perfectly in the center of the glass. They're perfect. I loved them.
customer_reviews.author: csue

customer_reviews.title: nice clean smell
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a candle rack at cottage. worked great and wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Nice but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on my table, some discoloration on waxes (some white, some cream). Two votives were chipped in arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Nice glass.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well packaged, does the job. I keep these around to have elegant candle light when needed on a table, or by my meditation bench.
customer_reviews.author: Waterfall2

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient but not best quality
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers mentioned, the votive candle wax has to be wiped off each individual candle upon arrival
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, good price for both the candle and holder together. Very good packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: NOT Unscented
customer_reviews.text: Not truly unscented. We bought these for a dinner with guests who have allergies to fragrances and perfumes, and they were definitely NOT unscented. Whether it is a manufacturing issue or not, avoid these if you are looking for truly unscented candles.
customer_reviews.author: CS09

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great product!
customer_reviews.text: The votives were well made and gave a pretty glow. I used them at my 50th class reunion. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Candles have a very strong fragrance. If this is ...
customer_reviews.text: Candles have a very strong fragrance. If this is something you might use when serving food, choose another product. It is not unscented as advertised, but is heavily perfumed.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The cost for these simple candles was perfect. They are great for ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: DLTyree

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect candles for a romantic ambiance or to stock up for power outages.
customer_reviews.author: H.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed with these candles. The glass votives were all scratched and dirty and the entire package inside and out were covered in hair like fibers. Unfortunately, I'll be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality♡
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty much as expected. They came packaged very nicely and none were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shattered and NOT Unscented!!
customer_reviews.text: These were completely smashed!!! Not a bit of padding was added to a box of GLASS votives! When I opened it there were shards of glass and fine glass dust EVERYWHERE. They also stunk- NOT unscented. Really unhappy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These candles were the perfect candles to go in my little christmas holders. They really do last the whole 12 hours. I was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Heavy duty glass and packing was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Littlejones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles are perfect since they are in the glass holders. Burned beautifull and did not tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely candle set
customer_reviews.text: Used for my wedding day. I had plenty for my tables and they looked beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Oliveros

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend these candles
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend these candles. As others have noted they are very dirty. I paid for new candles but received candles that have obviously been used. You can find cheaper, higher quality candles elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Charley E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not safe, glass broken when received
customer_reviews.text: Three of the glasses were broken when I receive them. Each candle last about 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia26yang

customer_reviews.title: Just right and a nice price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, no scent, white color in a glass holder. Perfect for emergencies or table lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Applewhite MinyardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: broken candles
customer_reviews.text: I never rate 1 star for any product. but I recieved these candles today and although the packaging was good, half of them are broken. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Parva

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: One cup was broken. You can do very romantic atmosphere with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The person I purchased it for was very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Has a soothing smell. The person I purchased it for was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: True to the label odorless (until you blow them out) and looked very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Worked well and didn't heat up the glass so it's safe to set on carpet and books. True to the label odorless (until you blow them out) and looked very pretty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Candles arrived on time they were perfect for the ceremony. I'm ordering another box!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as advertised. The glass holders are fairly substantial. The candles are evenly poured and high quality. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. One of them came with wax all over the holder and was loose though.

customer_reviews.title: Candles were great and larger than others at this price
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was beat up, but idc. Candles were great and larger than others at this price.

customer_reviews.title: Great candles but 3 arrived broken because it was poorly ...
customer_reviews.text: Great candles but 3 arrived broken because it was poorly packaged. I didn't bother to send back because of time restraint.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Half of them did not burn correctly. The wick would sink into the wax or break after burning and I could not light many of them again.

customer_reviews.title: Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what you should expect in candles and they last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality wax and glass, and lasted all night with much more to go!

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, clear glass with white votive/candles inside; they worked perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged well.
customer_reviews.text: My votives arrived same day I delivered which was great but one was broken unfortunately. Not a big enough deal to send them all back but def poor packing on their part.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for me. Stayed lit the whole time too!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cheap looking and poorly made. I do not recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: lasts for more than 24 hours. and the glass is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One broken candle in box
customer_reviews.text: One of the candles was broken and it was clear the damage occurred before shipment because the broken pieces of glass were not in the box. The candles themselves are fine and a good value for the money. I just wish they had better QA control
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fan

customer_reviews.title: The candles themselves were ok but 3 of them were ...
customer_reviews.text: The candles themselves were ok but 3 of them were broken upon delivery. Shards of glass throughout the box when I opened it. I needed the candles so kept them but not sure I would order glass from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came quick. Just as pictured. 4 stars because one of the candles was cracked and messy.

customer_reviews.title: love these little Votive candles
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and even lit candles, love these little Votive candles.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied buyer
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with item. Fast delivery and ease of purchase. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: What a great deal! The packaging was perfect and ensures that no glass is broken in transit.

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: It burns up pretty fast, but I have no complaint. Please make a clear gel type too!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These Glass Voltive Candel are excelllent quality and an excelent value.

customer_reviews.text: The candles are perfect for table candles hence the reason I ordered them. Sadly, 2 were broken beyond repair. No packaging support what so ever.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful when lit. They have a very long burn time. I was very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy!
customer_reviews.text: While the candles themselves are probably ok the box and glass votives arrived with wax all over them. I am not pleased as these were to be part of a gift. Now I will have to come up with a way to get the wax off the glass or just purchase something locally.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.text: i trimmed them with gold glitter tape and they came ouy great

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Wax is all over the outside of the glass. Looks very bad. Would not purchase again. Not clean nice candles like the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Only problem is that it is kind of heavy so it falls down my chubby thigh. I wont be able to wear it during the wedding, I'm just gonna wear it for the wedding night. :)

customer_reviews.title: incomplete order
customer_reviews.text: The box of twelve only had eight candles in it.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed! Required a star rating
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they said they r reuseable, but they really aren't, u can't take the wick piece out of the holder cause they r glued down, can't even pay them out! The wick pieces aren't even in the center, so when they burn the glass breaks cause it gets to hot, they aren't centered, they also don't burn white, some do, but some turn a yellow orange color, will never buy again, very disappointed! Required a star rating, no star!!
customer_reviews.author: Jmgm

customer_reviews.title: Does not burn for amount of time expected
customer_reviews.text: Burns half way through then goes out. First though it was just a bad one in the bunch. But all of them burned the same. The wick would bend over into the wax and then go out. These candles also emit an odor that requires more circulation than usual. Bought 2 boxes (dozens)
customer_reviews.author: S High

customer_reviews.title: there look pretty
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described...i used them for my wedding reception.since they look so "plain" i add alittle of sparkle(with giller on the top with "mudge glue" on them...there look pretty nice

customer_reviews.title: Glass cups are extremely cheap and thin.

customer_reviews.title: Flawless!  Amazing looking and well packaged!
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged and look beautiful! Absolutely perfect! Thank you so much!

customer_reviews.title: The candles that arrived looked nothing like the pictures online
customer_reviews.text: The candles that arrived looked nothing like the pictures online. Also, all of the candle wicks were incredibly short - too short to burn well. Now I have to go out and buy new candles that actually work. Definitely not worth it! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dearest Heart

customer_reviews.title: Another drunk purchase
customer_reviews.text: Burn kind of quick, no scent. I don't know why I bought these, I must have been drinking

customer_reviews.title: Handy, Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and intact. They last a good long time. I've had them burn as long as 12 hours if there's no fan running. The candle (actually the wick end) is glued down with a really strong adhesive. Just fyi for anyone who might want to try to take out the candle. Or hang them upside-down, I don't know. :D
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Shouse

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed placing these all around my bath tub & not ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping these would fit inside some pink-salt candle holders I got for Christmas - they don't. The glass makes the candle too thick. (Regular votives fit.) However, I enjoyed placing these all around my bath tub & not having to worry about an overwhelming smell or how long they would last (as I have to for tea candles). I may have had to throw away one or two due to cracked glass, (can't remember perfectly). All in all I'm very happy with this purchase, even though I'm not using them as I intended.
customer_reviews.author: A. Leard

customer_reviews.title: Candle last 2-3 hours average
customer_reviews.text: These only last about 2-3 hours. The presentation is very nice. I was able to get 4 hours out of a couple of them but there was almost no wax left and I was afraid it would bust the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: A bunch if candles that last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing! They are so beautiful in a dimly lit room. Glad I bought these, great deal!

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with purchase, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: All I received was 12 EMPTY glass cups No candles or wax for them! What a rip off

customer_reviews.title: Shining example
customer_reviews.text: These candles are excellent. They burn a full 12 hr. plus!! No scent, no smoke. About as close to perfect as you can get.
customer_reviews.author: George Anast

customer_reviews.title: they do the job- and look great too!
customer_reviews.text: great looking candles. made a great long-term redundant light source rather than using flash lights the entire time during the hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SOLUTION!
customer_reviews.text: These quality candles are the best way to use your favorite candle holders! Aside from it being a nuisance to have to clean out decorative holders when votive candles burn down inside them, I have damaged and even broken a few holders in the process. No more! When these burn down, the unit is removed and owing to the clean burn, can be reused to hold tea lights or other mini candles.
customer_reviews.author: Annespan65

product_meta.title: Hosley Set of 12 Unscented Clear Glass Wax Filled Votive Candles, 12 Hour Burn Time. Glass Votive & Hand Poured Candle Included, Ideal for Aromatherapy, Weddings, Party Favors O1
product_meta.description: HOSLEY'S Set of 12 Unscented Glass Filled Votive Candles. Perfect for weddings, holidays and other events. 12 hour burn time. Glass Votive & Candle included, ideal for Aromatherapy, Weddings, Party Favors. Horsley candles are equally well suited for to a variety of indoor and outdoor uses, including emergency power outages or simply providing warm, ambient light. Available in economical 12 pack or bulk 48 pack, be sure to keep your emergency kit stocked with extra Horsley candles. To maximize the burn of your candle, we suggest trimming and maintaining the wick to 1/8”. Trimming the wick helps maintain an even burn and helps keep the flame from getting too close to the glass. As a general rule, we also suggest using for no more than 4 hours at a time to maximize the burn duration. Always use on heat/flame resistant surface and burn within sight. Keep away from things that can catch fire and away from children and pets. Always keep the wax pool clear of wick trimmings, matches and debris at all times. Product may come in a different package.
feature_bullets: PRODUCT: Hosley's Unscented Glass Votive Candles, set of 12
USE: These are perfect for adding a decorative touch to any room's decor. Perfect for everyday use, wedding, events, aromatherapy,Spa, Reiki, Meditation, Bathroom setting.
BENEFITS: They are unscented hand poured wax.
MEASUREMENTS/MATERIAL: Made from premium wax Measurement 2 1/2" x 2.5". each candle has a burn time of 12 hours with a set of 12 in the order.

HOSLEY BRAND PRODUCTS: Hosley brand products are made from quality raw materials with minimal wastage at every step of production. With the goal of achieving a neutral carbon footprint, please recycle and help leave Mother Earth better off for future generations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars419 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
